lead_paragraph: Confident Japanese swimmer Kosuke Hagino said he was targeting a hat-trick of gold medals at the Rio de Janeiro Olympics and was looking forward to a showdown with American idols Michael Phelps and Ryan Lochte.

headline.main: Japan's Hagino Plots Rio Downfall of Phelps, Lochte
headline.print_headline: Japan's Hagino Plots Rio Downfall of Phelps, Lochte

snippet: Confident Japanese swimmer Kosuke Hagino said he was targeting a hat-trick of gold medals at the Rio de Janeiro Olympics and was looking forward to a showdown with American idols Michael Phelps and Ryan Lochte....
